definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
Mainichi Shimbun, a Japanese daily newspaper
every day and every hour/hourly and daily (idiom)

sentences.english: The paladin's number of spells per day does not increase after 20th level.
sentences.chinese: 聖騎士的每日施法數量不會在20級後繼續增加。

sentences.english: Take one to two caplets daily, preferably with meals.
sentences.chinese: 每日一至二粒，餐後服用更佳。

sentences.english: We ought not to need the exhortation: it should be our constant habit all the day and every day.
sentences.chinese: 這應該是基督徒每日的習慣，無需特別耳提面命。

sentences.english: Are you getting a dozen email newsletters delivered to your inbox on a daily or weekly basis?
sentences.chinese: 每日或每週時事資訊郵件？

sentences.english: Children take 1 Good Health Bio-Active Bee Pollen capsule daily, in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 孩子每日上午1粒好健康生物活性蜂花粉膠囊。

sentences.english: Above grilled items are served with baked potato or French fries and vegetables of the day.
sentences.chinese: 以上各式烤肉配烤土豆或炸薯條和每日時蔬。

sentences.english: Maximum lean growth daily may not always be sought .
sentences.chinese: 每日的最大瘦肉生長量不可能經常達到。

sentences.english: Custodian fee of fund is set aside every day and paid every month.
sentences.chinese: 基金託管費每日計提，按月支付。

sentences.english: She's also e-mailing me daily to-do lists.
sentences.chinese: 她還把每日需打理事務的清單電郵給我。

sentences.english: My boss at the Daily Gazette was called Mr McArdle.
sentences.chinese: 我在《每日新聞》的老闆叫麥卡阿德爾先生。

sentences.english: How long do you usually spend on internet per day?
sentences.chinese: 你每日花多小時間上網？

sentences.english: This specialized documentation is a combination of historical documentation and daily procedures.
sentences.chinese: 這個專門的文檔是歷史記錄文檔和每日過程的組合。

sentences.english: Over the following three weeks, I sat in daily meditation for only five minutes.
sentences.chinese: 在接下來的三週，我每日坐禪僅5分鐘。

sentences.english: Take 1 mini capsule twice daily to support a healthy heart.
sentences.chinese: 每日一至兩粒，進餐時服。

sentences.english: Write down what you want to get done - in order - and put it on a daily schedule.
sentences.chinese: 按重要的次序寫下你要完成的爲你的每日計劃。

sentences.english: Most scholars claim daily drink no more than 60 degrees liquor 25 ml.
sentences.chinese: 多數學者主張每日飲60度白酒不超過25毫升。

definition: to fix a time/fixed time/timed (of explosive etc)
one week/all the way around/a whole cycle
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
